sentences.cn: …大多数当代文学作品的平庸。

sentences.en: Because in the hearts of love. Ordinary without mediocrity.
sentences.cn: 爱因为在心中平凡而不平庸.

sentences.en: Caricature is the tribute that mediocrity pays to genius.
sentences.cn: 笨拙的模仿,是凡人对天才呈献的赞词.

sentences.en: Classicality - Creatiom achieves classical, creation renew classical. We missed mediocrity.
sentences.cn: 典 -- 创作成就经典, 创作延续经典.我们与平庸无缘!

sentences.en: Fortunately for him she had on the other side Lord Faudel, a most intelligent middle - aged mediocrity.
sentences.cn: 算他运气,她的另一边是福德尔勋爵, 一位十分聪明的 中年 庸才.

sentences.en: His acting career started brilliantly, then sank into mediocrity.
sentences.cn: 他的演艺生涯开场时轰轰烈烈，然后就变得庸庸碌碌。

sentences.en: His plays are distinguished only by their stunning mediocrity.
sentences.cn: 他的戏剧与众不同之处就是平凡得出奇.

sentences.en: Its usual blessing are happiness and mediocrity.
sentences.cn: 这种性情通常给人的幸福是快乐和平庸.

sentences.en: Moreover, the structure of the country's bureaucracy stifles initiative and promotes mediocrity.
sentences.cn: 另外, 中国的官僚结构抑制了首创精神,促使人平庸无所作为.

sentences.en: Not taking chances will lead to a life of colorless mediocrity.
sentences.cn: 不去冒险会让你的生活平淡、中庸、无趣.

sentences.en: Pain pulls us out of mediocrity; desire drives us toward excellence.
sentences.cn: 痛苦让我告别平庸, 渴望带我奔向辉煌.

sentences.en: Perhaps you would bear your mediocrity with more ease.
sentences.cn: 可能你会阁较平常心忍受你的平凡.

sentences.en: That's why experienced mediocrity almost always trumps talent every time.
sentences.cn: 这就是为何老练的平庸几乎每每胜过才华.

sentences.en: The old poet decried the mediocrity of today's writing.
sentences.cn: 老诗人抨击了现代文体的平庸无奇.

sentences.en: This often becomes a watershed in mediocrity and genius!
sentences.cn: 这往往就成为了庸才和天才的分水岭!

sentences.en: Thomas Wolfe is not a mediocrity.
sentences.cn: 托马斯·沃尔夫却非平庸之辈.

trans.tran_cn: 平庸，平凡，庸人，平平常常的才能
trans.tran_en: If you refer to the mediocrity of something, you mean that it is of average quality but you think it should be better
